content.p: The Channels CRUD module gives access to documents stored in XML databases.

CRUD stands for Create, Read, Update, Delete. The accessor enable CRUD operations on documents stored in an XML database, together with operations on the database itself, namely open, delete, get and query.

The following operations are supported:
Opening a database
Deleting a database
Querying a database
Creating a document
Deleting a document
Getting a document
Updating a document
Synchroning accesses
Asynchronous accesses to Documents are synchronized via a Multiple Reads Exclusive Write synchronizer.
This library requires that DBXML is installed on the host operating system. The latest version can be downloaded at here.

A database is a named XML container.
